text:
@CNN @SethAbramson Either Trump used a fuzzy math or Trump denied a reality fact
He's a buffoon
Why?
B/c IF -he admitted it so many times- from Wuhan/China Covid19 has invaded 184 Nations worldwide,
THEN what made Trump concluded that from Metro NY/NJ Covid19 can NOT spread to all 51 States in US?
